title: Impact Italic?
content:
It's an ugly font, but I'm trying to match something for a client. It looks very much like an italicized version of Impact..but not quite.  
Any suggestions?  
Thanks in advance.  
-NP
author: hunting_lodge

comments.content:
There was a Helvetica Inserat or AG Inserat Grotesque that may work.

ChrisL

Do you have an image?  
It may be something like Akzidenz grotesk extrabold italic, or it's helvetica equivalent?

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/akzidenz-grotesk-be/extra-bold-ita...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150403002052/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/akzidenz-grotesk-be/extra-bold-italic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/akzidenz-grotesk-be/extra-bold-italic/")
Gah! Chris, you're too quick. Great minds...

I should have added the name Compacta to my above post.

ChrisL
